thread.title: Travel agent creates package around Princess Beatrice's FIFTEEN annual holidays
thread.title_full: Travel agent creates package around Princess Beatrice's FIFTEEN annual holidays

title: Travel agent creates package around Princess Beatrice's FIFTEEN annual holidays
text:
GETTY The young royal has been enjoying her time abroad this year 
The 63 days away can be snapped up for £10,000 and includes all 15 locations the Princess has visited. 
This includes ski trips to Switzerland, three visits to New York, city breaks to Rome, Florence and Athens plus beach breaks in St Maarten and the Bahamas. 
Second in line to the holiday throne is Tamara Ecclestone, giving Princes Beatrice some stiff competition having been abroad an estimated 12 times this year, hitting glamorous locations like Milan, Lake Como, Monaco, New York and the Bahamas. 
Another princess attracting headlines this summer, Princess Marie-Olympia of Greece, has been swamping social media with selfies from some of the most glamorous destinations in the world. 
Spotted holidaying with other high profile teens, Princess Olympia has been taken advantage of her well connected friends staying in mansions across Greece, Bahamas and Italy. A photo posted by Tamara Ecclestone Rutland (@tamaraecclestoneofficial) on Jul 20, 2015 at 9:10am PDT 
Amanda Cumine, Brand Director at lastminute.com, has spoken out about the girls' travelling ways. 
She said: "The 15 holidays Princess Beatrice has been on this year we estimate would cost a whopping £300,000 in total. 
"Here at lastminute.com we created ‘The Bea-trip’ for the rest of the nation who want to live the royal highlife without breaking the bank." 
Amanda added: "The 63 day holiday combination includes skiing in Verbier, taking multiple bites out of the Big Apple and enjoying some well-deserved R&R in the Caribbean and is available for £10,000. 
"For those lucky enough to secure such generous annual leave, this isn’t such a princely sum." Related articles
